attributes.action: Adjust the Current Rules on Sentencing of Criminals (For Pesonel Attack Victims)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Criminals should be forced to pay Compensation to Injured Parties where Personel Attack takes place.
Personel Attack should be qualified as :
1/ Breakins, Damage,Attack in the Home, public place, rage attacks
2/ Car Stealing and Damage
Example: If somebody is attacked in the home,receives Property damage through Breaking and Entering and theft, The offender should receive a Dual sentence as follows
1.Cost analysis of Damage including stress and injury.
2. Offender received a 12 month sentence and Must work in Jail to pay compensation to victim(s) identified by the analysis
3. Assuming the Cost of Property damage and Personel Injury amounts to £800.00
then a sentence of 12 months or £800.00 whichever is the greater to the offender.If the offender gets stroppy and refuses to work while in Jail then the offender stays there until the £800.00 is paid.There may be an initial shout about, but if the Law supports a no tolerence stance in this area i think the offenders will get the message
